评论详情: The face mask that is designed into the hood is attached on both sides but not on the bottom. this seems fine at first but after moving your head around for a few min, the hole on the bottom exposes its self and you can see threw it. i can stand in front of my mirror and my chin is still exposed. The intention of the design is fire but it could 10000% be crafted more efficiently. I would value this hoodie at 29$ at the highest. they need thicker thread count, and the bottom of the face mask sown shut & The hood needs to be three times the ratio of what it is.

评论详情: My son loves this hoodie. First time he wore it to school he came home with one of the zip ties broken. Must’ve not been stitched to well. He takes good care of his school clothes and hangs them up as soon as he gets back. This was disappointing.

This hoodie is great! It's super warm and very well constructed, the material is not thin and cheap feeling at all. The little side pockets on the sleeves are cool looking and the tall cowl is great for keeping the wind off the bottom part of your face and neck. Since they did not put the meaning of the Kanji on the back, I can tell you 匯田工業 translates to "Huìtián Industries" which just seems to be a company name. This hoodie looks pretty spot on to how it looks in the picture and I am very impressed with the stitching around the hood and cowl area especially. It feels very heavy duty and sturdy. I highly recommend this hoodie!

This hoodie is going to be a gift for my son, who loves anything Japanese and basically lives in hoodies. It's very good quality. Looks exactly like the photo. The knit fabric is substantial, all the stitching and other details are very well done. Worth the price.

If you are looking for a stylish, warm, and very nicely made sweatshirt, look no further. Sizing is accurate, the images show an XL and how it fits me. I like to have a little breathing room and the sizing on this sweatshirt allows for that, just right.  Materials are top notch and I have the feeling that this sweatshirt will go the distance. Styling is the real reason I got this sweatshirt, very modern, tech design that isn't super loud. This sweatshirt is super thick and super warm, for me, it makes me sweat in anything higher than 40 F, but your mileage may vary.  Highly recommended.

The listing says “heavyweight cotton, fleece and polyester blend material “. Absolutely FALSE! This is made of some cheap cotton fabric. It’s so thin that you can see the light through. There is NO fleece at all. The garment making quality is bad. There are loose threads everywhere. I have an average head size but still have problems pushing my head through the neck opening. The worst thing is the smell of the material. I washed it twice and still can’t get rid of it. I just have to throw it away as garbage. What a waste of money!!
